job.title: VMWare Systems Engineer
job.industry: Computer Software,Information Technology and Services,Computer Networking
job.description: stronguJob SummarybrbrustrongResponsible for supporting the VMware initiatives automation operational support of infrastructure components and supporting technologiesbrbrReviews market trends and collaborate with vendors and other technology teams to develop infrastructure solutionsbrbrProvide VMware infrastructure design and support with a specific focus on VMware Infrastructure as a ServicebrbrPosition provides high level competency in the form of standards design and solution architecture for VMwarebased servicesbrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrong5 years relevant experience providing infrastructure solutions and support with a focus on VMware based cloud technologies such as VMware ESXi VMware Site Recovery Manager vRealize Automation VMware NSX vSphere vCenter and vROPsbrbrExperience with adjacent technologies such as virtualization networking automationbrbrExperience with major enterprise hardware platforms ie NutanixbrbrstronguExperience With AWS Or Other Cloud Technology a PlusbrbrustrongComfortable adapting to dynamic rapid and shifting environmentsbrbrExperience creating innovative and unique solutions for automation using scripting languages and simplifying administration for othersbrbrDemonstrated ability to teach new skills and concepts to junior members of the teambrbrStrong communication skills and selfstarter attitude with a strong ability to exercise independent judgment and critical thinking with minimal supervisionbrbrStrong understanding of Enterprise Best PracticesbrbrAnalytical and research skills and problem solvingbrbrEducationbrbrBachelors degree preferredbrbrIf interested please forward your resume to kevinlibertyjobscombrbrassociatebrbrmidbrbrITbrbrvmwarebrbrCode libertynullbrbr
